ValidationRule.description: When User Select Outstation Cheque of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection then not entering data in Forex Amount
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Outstation Cheque') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'Forex') , ISBLANK( FOREX__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Outstation Cheque of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection Pick List,Forex Amount cann't be blank.
